My solution and steps

01

Choosing product or service. I had the following options: taxi, real estate, web service or startup — website constructor, hosting, CRM, etc. I have chosen hosting theme.

02

Studying references on dribbble. Requests are: «tariff», «card», «pricing». Watching how tariff-block is made on Tilda, Megaplan, Chatra, Miro, Invision, etc.

03

I understand that the task is wider and it is necessary to provide the design of the comparison table for a large number of parameters.

04

Preparing content.

05

Choosing color scheme and fonts.

06

Making mockup in Figma.

07

Converting mockup to html, css and js.
